## Interval.include() method

Returns a new version of this interval such that `x` is included. If `x` lies outside the current interval, the new one will be extended correspondingly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
include(x: number): Interval;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Interval`
